spaced.description: If set to true, the corresponding direction margins will be set to 8px; It can also be set to a size in CSS units, including unit name, or one of the xs|sm|md|lg|xl predefined sizes
spaced.description_zh: 如果设置为 true，则相应的方向外边距将设置为 8px;它也可以设置为 CSS 单位的大小，包括单位名称，或 xs|sm|md|lg|xl 预定义大小之一

inset.description: If set to Boolean true, the left and right margins will be set to 16px. If set to 'item' then it will match a QItem's design. If set to 'item-thumbnail' then it will match the design of a QItem with a thumbnail on the left side
inset.description_zh: 如果设置为布尔值 true，则左右边距将设置为 16px。如果设置为 'item' ，则它将匹配 QItem 的设计。如果设置为“item-thumbnail”，则它将与左侧缩略图的QItem的设计匹配

vertical.description: If set to true, the separator will be vertical.
vertical.description_zh: 如果设置为 true，则分隔符将为 vertical。

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the ACTIVE button
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称
